column1: wow ! on point as usual melonie !!! i never ever made the connection that her office character was just her being herself! great observation! poor hr tobey would be beside himself knowing her real life antics are 100 times worse then micheal scott s scripted reality !!! when i saw this story about her awhile back i knew you d be all over it and lois lane tha  crap out of it !!!! you need to make some freakin decoder rings so we can super-friend support you   lol. thanks for your dedication.  you are always in my prayers
